attributes.action: move towards reducing the scale of UK armed forces to that of a defensive rather than offensive function
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Renounce the infantile folly of engaging in wars which, as an existing signatory of the 1928 International Treaty to Renounce War the UK government already fully recognises is illegal and rather move towards the promotion of peace by addressing the real causes of war.
